effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 921,177 damage to your primary target and 142,746 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,278 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 191 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Blastfurious Machete
description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
